sense.def:
S tistim, kar je
formidable
, se je težko spopasti ali tisto premagati.

seg.quote: He had earned the reputation of being a formidable opponent.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
formidable
, je osupljivo, ker je tako dobro ali veliko.

seg.quote: ...the formidable army of brains that are at the Prime Minister's disposal.
